name: Escape Gravity (TooMuch2Do)
description:
Escape Gravity is the product of Score Space Jam!

A little high-score game where you attempt to flee the increasing pull of a star that has recently turned into a black hole.  Can you make it out in time?!

... No... I made sure you can not =P

:: Controls ::

  • Fly with Arrow Keys. 
  • Press Space to shoot, if you've acquired the necessary buff.

:: CREDITS ::

  • Code - Steven French
  • Art/Music  - Pit

:DISCLAIMER:

  • Background Images were sourced from Google.
  • Buff Sprites as well.
